body:
Made of God media/Tv is a platform created to catapult talents in the gospel sector to great heights. It offers promo, sponsorship, and opportunities, at the same time provides entertainment to their audience. Ever dream of reaching your goals? then MOG is your spring board.

> *Your number one online portal for Christian Infotainment..*
seo_keywords: About us, made of God, blogging
title: About Us
